function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social distancing and hygiene measures in the workplace","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission among employees and stakeholders","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing protocols, regular sanitation, and hygiene education","Technologies":"Contactless attendance systems, air purification systems","People":"Employees, stakeholders, visitors","Owner":"Management, HR, Operations team"},{"Description":"Lack of emotional support and engagement with employees","Impact":"Decreased morale and mental well-being of employees, leading to lower productivity and satisfaction","Mitigation":"Regular check-ins, counseling services, team-building activities","Technologies":"Mental health apps, communication platforms","People":"Employees, HR, Leadership team","Owner":"HR, Leadership team, Employee Assistance Program providers"},{"Description":"Non-compliance with legal and regulatory requirements","Impact":"Legal repercussions and reputational damage for the organization","Mitigation":"Regular legal compliance training, audits, and monitoring","Technologies":"Compliance management software, training platforms","People":"Leadership team, Legal department, Compliance officers","Owner":"Legal department, Compliance officers, Leadership team"}]}
